Not Configured.title: Extension not Configured
Not Configured.description: It looks like this extension is not configured for this server
Not Configured.suggestions: If you have the correct permissions try configuring the extension and try again

Not Enabled.title: Extension not Enabled
Not Enabled.description: It looks like this extension is not enabled for this server
Not Enabled.suggestions: If you have the correct permissions try enabling the extension and try again

Already Configured.title: Extension Already Configured
Already Configured.description: It looks like this extension is already configured for this server
Already Configured.suggestions: Before you can configure the extension again you must delete the current configuration

Already Enabled.title: Extension Already Enabled
Already Enabled.description: It looks like this extension is already enabled for this server
Already Enabled.suggestions: Before you can enable the extension again you must disable it

Already Disabled.title: Extension Already Disabled
Already Disabled.description: It looks like this extension is already disabled for this server
Already Disabled.suggestions: Before you can disable the extension again you must enable it

Configuration Timed Out.title: Configuration Timed Out
Configuration Timed Out.description: It looks like the configuration for this extension took too long to complete
Configuration Timed Out.suggestions: If you have the correct permissions try configuring the extension again

Missing Argument.title: Missing Argument
Missing Argument.suggestions: Make sure you provide all the required arguments and try again

default.title: Default Error
default.description: An unexpected error occurred while processing your request

Invalid Permissions.title: Invalid Permissions
Invalid Permissions.description: You do not have permission to use this command
Invalid Permissions.suggestions: Make sure you have all the necessary roles and try again

Invalid Channel.title: Invalid Channel
Invalid Channel.description: This command can not be used in this channel
Invalid Channel.suggestions: Try using this command in its appropriate channel

Interaction Expired.title: Interaction expired
Interaction Expired.description: This interaction has expired and is no longer valid.
Interaction Expired.suggestions: Try again one or two times

RecordNotFoundError.title: Record not found
RecordNotFoundError.description: this record was not found in the database

DuplicateRecordError.title: Duplicate record error
DuplicateRecordError.description: this record seems to be already in the database

3030.title: NSFW Content detected
3030.description: It looks like your message contains NSFW content and it is not allowed to create an image with this type of content
3030.suggestions: If you think the message content is legitimate try changing some words in the prompt and sending the command again.
